title: Distributivity
statement: Prove that a*(b+c) = a*b + a*c for natural numbers
lean_theorem: theorem distrib (a b c : ℕ) : a * (b + c) = a * b + a * c := by ring

title: And Elimination
statement: Prove that p ∧ q → p (conjunction elimination)
lean_theorem: theorem and_elim_left (p q : Prop) (h : p ∧ q) : p := h.left

title: Power Derivative
lean_theorem: example : deriv (fun x : ℝ => x^2) = fun x => 2*x := by ext x; simp [deriv_pow]

title: Intersection Commutativity
statement: Prove A ∩ B = B ∩ A (intersection is commutative)
lean_theorem: theorem inter_comm (A B : Set α) : A ∩ B = B ∩ A := Set.inter_comm A B

title: Even Plus Two
statement: If n is even, then n+2 is even
lean_theorem: theorem even_add_two (n : ℕ) (h : Even n) : Even (n + 2) := by omega
